Package tictactoe.console

Class TicTacToe

  • java.lang.Object
    • tictactoe.console.TicTacToe
  • public class TicTacToe
extends java.lang.Object
    A game of Tic-Tac-Toe played in the console.
    Author:
    Tapio Malmberg

        Main program entry point.

      • printInstructions

        private static void printInstructions()
        Prints the commands available in the game to the console.

      • createGame

        private static void createGame()
        Creates the TicTacToeGame by asking the user for its settings.

      • getNumberInRange

        private static int getNumberInRange​(java.lang.String message,
                                    int min,
                                    int max)
        Gets a number in the given range from the user.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to print
        min - the inclusive minimum value allowed
        max - the inclusive maximum value allowed
        Returns:
        a number within the given range

      • getValidNumInARowToWin

        private static int getValidNumInARowToWin​(int width,
                                          int height)
        Gets a valid number of pieces in a row needed to win for the selected game board size.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the game board
        height - the height of the game board
        Returns:
        a valid number of pieces in a row needed to win

      • getComputerDifficulty

        private static ComputerPlayer getComputerDifficulty()
        Gets the computer difficulty from the user.
        Returns:
        a ComputerPlayer with the difficulty the user selected

      • doesComputerMakeFirstMove

        private static boolean doesComputerMakeFirstMove()
        Randomizes whether the computer starts and prints a message to the console.
        Returns:
        true if the computer makes the first move

      • playUntilUserQuits

        private static void playUntilUserQuits()
        Keeps playing games of Tic-Tac-Toe until the user chooses to quit.

      • confirmAnotherGame

        private static boolean confirmAnotherGame()
        Asks the user if they want to play another game.

        The user can also choose to change the settings of the game or undo the last move.

        Returns:
        true if the user wants to keep playing

      • playAGame

        private static void playAGame()
        Plays a game of Tic-Tac-Toe until the end or until the user quits.

        Keeps printing the game board using GameBoardPrinter and playing rounds until the game ends.

      • getPlayerMoveOrCommand

        private static void getPlayerMoveOrCommand()
        Prompts the user for a move until they give a valid one or a valid command.

      • processUserInput

        private static void processUserInput​(java.lang.String userInput)
        Processes the input from the user.

        Either processes a command or parses a coordinate from the user input and plays a round of Tic-Tac-Toe.

        Parameters:
        userInput - a string got from the user

      • processCommand

        private static void processCommand​(java.lang.String userInput)
        Processes a single character command got from the user.

        Changes gameState accordingly.

        Parameters:
        userInput - a string got from the user

      • parseCoordinate

        private static Coordinate parseCoordinate​(java.lang.String input)
        Parses a Coordinate from the user input.

        The coordinate can be input in two formats: "y x" or "y,x"

        Parameters:
        input - a string got from the user
        Returns:
        the parsed coordinate or null if the parsing failed

      • printGameResult

        private static void printGameResult()
        Prints an appropriate game over message to the console.
